title: Warring Kingdoms Nidalee
body: When I tried to play Team Builder with the Warring Kingdoms Nidalee skin it came up with an error screen and said "Invalid Skin". Anyone else seeing this?

replies.body: Someone else reported this issue with Mafia Graves. It doesn't appear to be skin specific. We're looking into it!

I don't know if this is topic related, but I'd like to input some feedback for the skin's cougar's "q" ability. For VFX, it seems that the cougar's "q" is plain. I barely notice whether I've hit an enemy or whether it's still activated in a fight. I was wondering if it'd be possible to maybe make her cougar's q vfx stand out. Maybe something like making the transform particles swirl around her body or paws as she activates her "q." (This is specific feedback for Warring Kingdoms Nidalee)
